tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ImageMetadata (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    image_path VARCHAR(255),
    image_format VARCHAR(10),
    image_size INT,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP,
    object_detection BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ImageMetadata (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name TEXT,
    image_path TEXT,
    image_size INT,
    image_format TEXT,
    capture_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ObjectAnnotations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    object_label TEXT,
    object_bbox TEXT,
    confidence FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES ImageMetadata(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ImageMetadata (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  image_name VARCHAR(255),
  image_path VARCHAR(255),
  capture_time TIMESTAMP,
  image_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE ObjectAnnotations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  object_name VARCHAR(255),
  object_category VARCHAR(50),
  object_confidence FLOAT,
  bounding_box_x INT,
  bounding_box_y INT,
  bounding_box_width INT,
  bounding_box_height INT,
  image_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES ImageMetadata(id)
);

CREATE TABLE DetectionResults (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  detection_time TIMESTAMP,
  detected_object_id INT,
  detection_confidence FLOAT,
  image_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (detected_object_id) REFERENCES ObjectAnnotations(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES ImageMetadata(id)
);

CREATE TABLE images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    image_size INT,
    image_format VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE objects (
    object_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    object_name VARCHAR(100),
    object_category VARCHAR(50),
    object_confidence FLOAT,
    image_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE annotations (
    annotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    object_id INT,
    annotation_text TEXT,
    annotation_author VARCHAR(100),
    annotation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (object_id) REFERENCES objects(object_id)
);

CREATE TABLE detections (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    detection_score FLOAT,
    object_id INT,
    detection_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (object_id) REFERENCES objects(object_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Object_Detections (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    object_label VARCHAR(50),
    bounding_box_x INT,
    bounding_box_y INT,
    bounding_box_width INT,
    bounding_box_height INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES Image_Metadata(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Image_Annotations (
    annotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    detection_id INT,
    tag_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES Image_Metadata(image_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (detection_id) REFERENCES Object_Detections(detection_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES Annotation_Tags(tag_id)
);
